text: Marianna Valovova (born 1918) was a Soviet speed skater. She was Soviet Champion in 1937. She competed at the 1949, 1950, 1951, and 1952 World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women . == References == Category:1918 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Speed skaters Category:Soviet sportspeople
title: Marianna Valovova
